title: Why you will have to drive farther to buy a new car
text: Retail and Consumer Why you will have to drive farther to buy a new car Wave of consolidation among car dealerships means there will be fewer places to buy a motor from, says Lookers chief Andy Bruce Impressive new delaerships can cost as much as Â£10m - a cost too great for small businesses to bear By Alan Tovey , Industry Editor 9:08PM BST 15 Aug 2015
